docs.hotel_address: 90/9 Srinakarin road, Nongbon, Pravet, Bangkok 10250, 10250 Bangkok, Thailand
docs.hotel_description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at The Vertical Suite! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
A 15-minute drive to Paradise Park Department Store, The Vertical Suite offers stylish accommodation with a kitchen and sauna. Guests can take a swim at an indoor pool or stay active at the fitness centre. Free WiFi is available throughout the property.
The residence is a 10-minute drive to Seacon Square. It is a 30-minute drive to Suvarnabhumi Airport.
Each unit is furnished with contemporary décor. It features a separate living area, dining area and balcony. It comes with a flat-screen TV and safety deposit box. Shower facilities are included in an en suite bathroom.
Massage treatments can be arranged at the front desk. Other services include shuttle bus and laundry. There is also meeting facilities on site.
Guests can enjoy international cuisine at The Roof Top Restaurant. Light snacks and beverages are served at the coffee shop.

docs.hotel_address: 143/61-62 Sukhumvit Soi 21 (Klongtoey Nue, Wattana), Wattana, 10110 Bangkok, Thailand
docs.hotel_description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at The Fusion Suites! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
The Fusion Suites is a boutique hotel providing contemporary and luxurious accommodation at the heart of Bangkok's business district with easy transportation links.
Fusion Suites provides easy access to the busy Sukhumvit area, popular with its shopping centres, eateries and nightlife. Exploring the city is also cost-effective and simple as it is close to Sukhumvit MRT station and Asoke Skytrain station.
Modern and stylish, rooms are furnished with a flat-screen television, an iPod docking station and DVD player. It also provides free high-speed internet access, and drinking water. Bathrooms feature a rain shower.
The fashionable Fusion Suites offers several guest services that include room service and laundry. It also has a business centre and a coffee shop, where you can relax with a warm drink and a book.

docs.hotel_address: 256 Soi Ladprao 122 (Mahadthai 1), Phlabphla, Wangthonglang, 10310 Bangkok, Thailand
docs.hotel_description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Atelier Suites! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Set in Bangkok, within 5.6 miles of Central Festival EastVille and 6.8 miles of Central Plaza Ladprao, Atelier Suites offers accommodation with a fitness centre and free WiFi throughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. The property is situated 8.1 miles from Chatuchak Weekend Market, 8.1 miles from Arab Street and 8.7 miles from Central Embassy. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, a concierge service and luggage storage for guests.
At the hotel all rooms come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, slippers and a hairdryer. Atelier Suites provides certain units with garden views, and rooms include a balcony. At the accommodation rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels.
Atelier Suites offers a terrace.
Emporium Shopping Mall is 8.7 miles from the hotel, while Amarin Plaza is 8.7 miles away. The nearest airport is Suvarnabhumi Airport, 14.3 miles from Atelier Suites.

docs.hotel_address: 290/2 M.10 Soi Phetkasem 67 Lane 12 Phetkasem Road Laksong, Bang Khae, 10160 Bangkok, Thailand
docs.hotel_description:
Located in Bangkok, 9.9 miles from Wat Arun, Penyos Suite provides accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a bar. Providing a garden, the property is located within 9.9 miles of Wat Pho. The hotel features city views, a terrace, a 24-hour front desk, and free WiFi is available throughout the property.
At the hotel each room is equipped with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a balcony with a garden view. Guest rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle.
Temple of the Emerald Buddha is 10.6 miles from Penyos Suite, while Grand Palace is 10.6 miles away. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 26.1 miles from the accommodation.

docs.hotel_address: 340 Songphapa Rd. Soi 20, Seekan, Donmaung, Bangkok, Don Muang, 10210 Bangkok, Thailand
docs.hotel_description:
Baik Suite has a restaurant, bar, a shared lounge and garden in Bangkok. This 3-star hotel offers an ATM and luggage storage space. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, a shuttle service, room service and free WiFi.
The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a fridge, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a desk. The units at the hotel come with a private bathroom and bed linen.
Central Plaza Ladprao is 11.8 miles from Baik Suite, while Chatuchak Weekend Market is 13 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 3.7 miles from the accommodation.

docs.hotel_address: 225 Soi Sukhumvit 4, Sukhumvit Road, Klongtoey, Khlong Toei, 10110 Bangkok, Thailand
docs.hotel_description:
A short walk from Nana's nightlife, Nanatai Suites offers rooms with air conditioning and free WiFi. It is less than a 15-minute walk from Nana BTS Skytrain Station and has an outdoor pool.
Meals can be ordered on-site or discovered nearby. Sukhumvit Road and the evening's street shopping is 2,800 feet away. Suvarnabhumi International Airport is a 18.6 miles drive away.
Each room has a flat-screen TV with cable channels. All rooms include a private bathroom with a bath and shower, with free toiletries provided. There is also a balcony and a refrigerator.
Facilities and services at Nanatai Suites include a fitness room, a free daily maid service and a 24-hour reception.

docs.hotel_address: 110-110/1 4-6 ,Sukhumvit Road, Khong Toey, Khlong Toei, 10110 Bangkok, Thailand
docs.hotel_description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Majestic Suites Hotel! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Majestic Suites Hotel is located along Bangkok’s Sukhumvit Road, a 10-minute walk from Nana BTS Skytrain Station. It features a restaurant and a 24-hour front desk. Free WiFi is provided.
The non-smoking rooms come with air conditioning, a cable TV, a safety deposit box, and a fridge with minibar. Each room has a private bathroom with a bathtub, shower, and hairdryer.
Majestic Suites Hotel is 1.2 miles from Platinum Fashion Mall‎ and 1.6 miles from MBK Shopping Centre‎. Suvarnabhumi Airport is 13.7 miles from the hotel.
Staff at the 24-hour front desk can help with tour bookings and laundry services. Internet and fax services are available at the business centre.
Thai and international dishes are served in the restaurant, while the lobby bar offers light snacks and beverages. Guests can also order room service.

docs.hotel_address: 688, Sukhumvit 65 Alley, Khwaeng Phra Khanong Nuea, Khet Watthana, Bangkok 10110, Wattana, 10110 Bangkok, Thailand
docs.hotel_description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Greenview Ekkamai10 Suite! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Located on Sukhumvit Road, Greenview Ekkamai10 features a rooftop pool area with panoramic city views of Bangkok. It offers free Wi-Fi and free shuttle service to Ekkamai BTS Skytrain Station and Big C Superstore.
The well-appointed apartments come with living and dining areas, plus a small kitchen with a fridge, microwave, and kitchenware. A flat-screen cable TV and a washing machine are also provided.
Greenview Ekkamai10 is a 30-minute drive from both Don Muang Airport and Suvarnabhumi International Airport. It is 10 minutes’ drive from Ekkamai BTS Skytrain Station.
Guests can enjoy a dip in the pool, or exercise in the gym. The hotel offers concierge assistance, airport transfers, and tour arrangements. Room service is available.

docs.hotel_address: 2/39-41 Soi Sukhumvit 41 (Pirom) Klongton Nua, Wattana, Wattana, 10110 Bangkok, Thailand
docs.hotel_description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at 41 Suite Bangkok! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Situated in the heart of Bangkok City’s Sukhumvit area, this non-smoking boutique property is surrounded by entertainment options. It offers a restaurant, a 24-hour front desk and rooms with free Wi-Fi access.
41 Suite Bangkok is within 1,650 feet of Prompong Skytrain Station, Benjasin Central Park and Emporium Department Store. Suvarnabhumi Airport is a 30-minute drive away.
Featuring wooden flooring and wall art, modern air-conditioned rooms at 41 Suite are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a hairdryer. In addition to a personal safe, a minibar and a light meal are included.
41 Club Restaurant serves a variety of Thai specialities and European favourites. Refreshing drinks are also available here.

docs.hotel_address: 403-403/1, 407-407/1 Sukhumvit Road, Klongtoeynuea, Wattana, Wattana, 10110 Bangkok, Thailand
docs.hotel_description:
You're eligible for a Genius discount at Sukhumvit Suites Hotel! To save at this property, all you have to do is sign in.
Sukhumvit Suites Hotel is situated between Sukhumvit Soi 21 and 23 beside Asoke BTS Train Station and opposite to Terminal 21 shopping mall. It is close to nightlife areas like Nana and Soi Cowboy. Its modern rooms are equipped with flat-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi.
Decorated in white and brown, the stylish rooms at Sukhumvit Suites are each equipped with a personal safe and satellite channels. A minibar and tea/coffee making facilities are also included.
For day trips and activities, guests can make travel arrangements with the friendly staff at Sukhumvit Suites tour desk. The hotel also provides Thai massage and laundry services.
Local and international dishes are served at the hotel’s Indulge Restaurant. A daily buffet breakfast is also available there.
Sukhumvit Suites Hotel is about 12.4 miles from Suvarnabhumi Airport. Emporium Mall, as well as the popular Bed Supper Club, are within one mile from the hotel. Sukhumvit MRT Station is just a minute walk from the property.
